title: Tiny Scores Volume 1
description: 12 Hybrid film music scores ranging from dark ambient underscore to fully blown title music.
longDescription:
"Tiny Scores Volume 1" is a collection of 12 hybrid tracks for games designers and virtual film makers. From children's TV title music to dark ambient underscoring there is something here for most occasions. Most of these pieces tend to develop in complexity over time and are easily editable. From edgy synth craziness to sweeping orchestral landscapes, they're all here.


Demo of the entire album available on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TXWHOdpc6sU&t=166s
technicalDetails:
Track List:

  1. The Submariner - 1960s Kids TV vibe
  2. Scenic Route - Hybrid electronic pulse and orchestral sweeps
  3. Fifty Fifty - Spacious Trip-Hop' inspired underscore
  4. Stranger than Fiction - Gentle hang drum theme that develops into full film/TV score
  5. The Royal Mile - Upbeat Ska inspired 1960s vibe with Mellotron, Hammond organ and Banjo!!!
  6. A Watery Grave - Mysterious ambient underwater vibe that slowly develops
  7. Hey You! - Weird Fender Rhodes and vocal theme lost in the Northern Californian tech forests
  8. Magnetic Resonance Imaging - Demented car chase vibe with sweeping psychedelic theme
  9. Romance is Dead - Classical piano and pizzicato orchestration for those 'rose coloured glasses'
  10. Mystery Mile - Dark underscore good for searching out that hidden treasure
  11. Room with a View - Bluesy trip-hop and lush orchestrated film score
  12. Halls of the Martian Queen - Threatening techno underscore into climactic orchestral theme


Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 39

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Refer to the Unreal documentation regarding the import of music and sound files

Important/Additional Notes: Thanks for looking.
